repairedDockerfile:
FROM drupal:fpm 

MAINTAINER brendan_anderson@hcpss.org 
LABEL vendor="Howard County Public School System" 
LABEL version="1.0.0" 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y wget git \
&& wget https://getcomposer.org/installer \
&& php ./installer \
&& rm ./installer \
&& mv ./composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

CMD ["/usr/local/bin/composer"]
